none: A drawing of Tacoma High School and the Tacoma Stadium, and also of a middle-aged man, presumably Paul Engell.  Red and white print.
Pacific Northwest Sheet Music : from the Ashford Collection

Materials in the Pacific Northwest Sheet Music collection are in the public domain.  No copyright permissions are needed.  Acknowledgement of the Pacific Northwest Sheet Music collection as a source for borrowed images is requested.

Front cover states that this song is "dedicated to the Tacoma public schools," and also that it "opened with a play-festival June 10-11, 1910".  Back cover provides a detailed description of the Tacoma Stadium.

Materials in the Pacific Northwest Sheet Music collection are in the public domain.  No copyright permissions are needed.  Acknowledgement of the Pacific Northwest Sheet Music collection as a source for borrowed images is requested.

seo.title: The Stadium march and two-step - Pacific Northwest Sheet Music Collection
